4763222.headline: Softbank Group: Amount Equivalent To Gain On Disposal Of Arm Shares Will Be Recorded As Capital Surplus In Consolidated Statement Of Financial Position
4763222.description: Sept 14 (Reuters) - SoftBank Group Corp <9984.T>::SOFTBANK GROUP CORP - AMOUNT EQUIVALENT TO GAIN ON DISPOSAL OF ARM SHARES WILL BE RECORDED AS CAPITAL SURPLUS IN CONSOLIDATED STATEMENT OF FINANCIAL POSITION.

4787042.headline: Arm Holdings Says Qtrly Adj EPS of $0.36 Versus LSEG IBES Estimate $0.26
4787042.description: Nov 8 (Reuters) - Arm Holdings Plc O9TY.F::ARM HOLDINGS QTRLY ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.36 VERSUS LSEG IBES ESTIMATE $0.26.ARM HOLDINGS QTRLY LOSS PER SHARE $0.11.ARM HOLDINGS QTRLY TOTAL REVENUE $806 MILLION VERSUS LSEG IBES ESTIMATE $744.3 MILLION.ARM HOLDINGS: AT QUARTER-END, 7.1 BILLION ARM-BASED CHIPS REPORTED AS SHIPPED, TAKING CUMULATIVE TOTAL TO 272.5 BILLION.ARM: QTRLY GAAP LOSS DUE TO SHARE-BASED COMPENSATION COSTS OF $509 MILLION AS IPO TRIGGERED ONE-TIME EXPENSE FOR PREVIOUSLY GRANTED SHARES.ARM: FUTURE RUN RATE EXPECTED TO BE BETWEEN $150 MILLION AND $200 MILLION PER QUARTER.ARM SEES Q3 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.21-$0.28.ARM SEES Q3 REVENUE $720 MILLION TO $800 MILLION.ARM SEES FY ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.00 TO $1.10.ARM SEES FY REVENUE $2.96 BILLION TO $3.08 BILLION.Q3 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.27, REVENUE VIEW $767.8 MILLION -- LSEG IBES DATA.ARM: HAS GOOD VISIBILITY OF LICENSING PIPELINE FOR H2, ALTHOUGH THERE IS UNCERTAINTY REGARDING EXACT TIMING OF SOME DEALS.FY2024 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.98, REVENUE VIEW $2.95 BILLION -- LSEG IBES DATA.ARM: SEMICONDUCTOR INDUSTRY REMAINS VULNERABLE TO CHANGES IN EXTERNAL MACROECONOMIC CONTEXT.Further company coverage: O9TY.F. ((Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com;)).

4819717.headline: Arm Holdings Sees Q4 Adjusted Earnings Per Share $0.28 - $0.32
4819717.description: Feb 7 (Reuters) - Arm Holdings Plc O9TY.F::ARM HOLDINGS: QTRLY ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.29 VERSUS LSEG IBES ESTIMATE $0.25.ARM HOLDINGS:  QTRLY TOTAL REVENUE $824 MILLION VERSUS LSEG IBES ESTIMATE $761.6 MILLION.ARM HOLDINGS: SEES Q4 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.28 - $0.32.ARM HOLDINGS: SEES Q4 REVENUE $850 MILLION - $900 MILLION.Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.21, REVENUE VIEW $780.3 MILLION -- LSEG IBES DATA.ARM HOLDINGS: SEES FY ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.20 - $1.24.FY2024 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.07, REVENUE VIEW $3.05 BILLION -- LSEG IBES DATA.ARM HOLDINGS: EXPECT TO GET HIGHER ROYALTY RATES PER DEVICE AS PARTNERS DEPLOY MORE ARM TECHNOLOGY PER DEVICE COMBINED WITH ADVANCED ARM TECHNOLOGY.ARM HOLDINGS: 7.7 BILLION ARM-BASED CHIPS FOR SEPT QUARTER SHIPPING PERIOD, TAKING CUMULATIVE TOTAL TO OVER 280 BILLION.ARM HOLDINGS: SEES FY REVENUE $3.16 BILLION - $3.21 BILLION.Further company coverage: O9TY.F. ((Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com;)).
